languages.text: "Где та тварь, что отсекла мне руку? Я достану тебя! Вырву твое сердце!"

traits.locale_text: "Где та тварь, что отсекла мне руку? Я достану тебя! Вырву твое сердце!"

languages.text: "Where is the scum that cut off my hand? I'm coming for you, and I'll rip out your heart!"
languages.original_text: "Где та тварь, что отсекла мне руку? Я достану тебя! Вырву твое сердце!"

traits.locale_text: "Where is that wretch who cut off my hand? I am coming for you! I will rip out your heart!"
"Where is that wretch who cut off my hand? I am coming for you! I will rip out your heart!"
"Where is that wretch who cut off my hand? I am coming for you, and I will rip out your heart!"
"Where is that wretch who cut off my hand? I am coming for you, and I will rip out your heart!"
"Where is the scum that cut off my hand? I'm coming for you, and I'll rip out your heart!"
"Where is the scum that cut off my hand? I'm coming for you, and I'll rip out your heart!"

languages.text: "Wo ist der Abschaum, der mir die Hand abgeschnitten hat? Ich komme Euch holen, und ich reiße Euch das Herz heraus!"
languages.original_text: "Where is the scum that cut off my hand? I'm coming for you, and I'll rip out your heart!"

traits.locale_text: "Wo ist der Abschaum, der mir die Hand abgeschnitten hat? Ich komme Euch holen, und ich reiße Euch das Herz heraus!"

languages.text: «¿Dónde está la escoria que me ha cortado la mano? Voy a por ti, ¡para arrancarte el corazón!».
languages.original_text: "Where is the scum that cut off my hand? I'm coming for you, and I'll rip out your heart!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Dónde está la escoria que me ha cortado la mano? Voy a por ti, ¡para arrancarte el corazón!».

languages.text: 「俺の手を切り落としたクズはどこだ？心臓をえぐりだしてやる！」
languages.original_text: "Where is the scum that cut off my hand? I'm coming for you, and I'll rip out your heart!"

traits.locale_text: 「俺の手を切り落としたクズはどこだ？心臓をえぐりだしてやる！」

languages.text: “那个砍了我的手的人渣在什么地方？我来找你了！我要把你的心挖出来！”
languages.original_text: "Where is the scum that cut off my hand? I'm coming for you, and I'll rip out your heart!"

traits.locale_text: “那个砍了我的手的人渣在什么地方？我来找你了！我要把你的心挖出来！”

languages.text: « Où est l'ordure qui m'a coupé la main ? Je vais te faire regretter d'avoir vu le jour ! »
languages.original_text: "Where is the scum that cut off my hand? I'm coming for you, and I'll rip out your heart!"

traits.locale_text: « Où est l'ordure qui m'a coupé la main ? Je vais te faire regretter d'avoir vu le jour ! »

languages.text: "Elimi kesen o pislik nerede? Seni bulup kalbini yerinden sökeceğim!"
languages.original_text: "Where is the scum that cut off my hand? I'm coming for you, and I'll rip out your heart!"
